content: Red Loong is an optional secret Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong. Hidden away in the Forest of Wolves, you won't be able to encounter this boss until you obtain a Key Item later in the game, and this boss is and appropriate challenging fight far stronger than anything else in Black Wind Mountain. Red Loong is one of four Loong Dragons that can be defeated to earn powerful weapon crafting materials.
